attributes.action: Reconsider his decision to stand down as Prime Minister until the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The nation does not deserve to be treated in this manner and I submit that the Prime Minister (Tony Blair) should reconsider his decision to resign as PM in June and either a). continue as PM until the next election; or b). call a general election now.  Either way we, the people, will enjoy greater stability that if we are placed under the 'guidance' of Gordon Brown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
